methods.name: ConvertToLinkedAnimGraph
methods.doc: Get a linked anim graph reference from an anim node reference

methods.name: ConvertToLinkedAnimGraphPure
methods.doc: Get a linked anim graph reference from an anim node reference (pure)

methods.name: GetLinkedAnimInstance
methods.doc: Get the linked instance is hosted by this node. If the node does not host an instance then HasLinkedAnimInstance will return false

methods.name: HasLinkedAnimInstance
methods.doc: Returns whether the node hosts an instance (e.g. linked anim graph or layer)
